forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
